The Western Civilization starts with Greek democracy of the privileged many, moves to the republic of the powerful few and goes to the more free vassage of the chosen noble. The non-viloent and universal Christianity played a critical role in moderating the fedual rights and its subsequent relaxation added a resource perspective to subsequent Western expansion.

AUKUS has its roots in Britain that developed the fastest among the Western nations. Its geography acted as both a protective barrier and as an incentive to have a more moderated, trade oriented outlook on warfare.
